title: A tweet about a Pentagon explosion was fake. It still went viral.
description: An apparently AI-generated image sparked a brief dip in stock markets Monday. Here's how it could have been worse.

title: TikTok sues Montana, saying state ban violates First Amendment
description: The federal lawsuit will set the stage for a broader debate over the short-video app and its Chinese parent company, ByteDance.

title: How to avoid falling for misinformation, fake AI images on social media
description: Breaking news moves fast online, and it can be difficult to tell what's real and what's purposefully misleading or fake. Here's how to sort through it all.

title: Amazon employees plan to walk off the job as tech worker tension rises
description: Some tech workers at Meta, Google and Amazon are concerned about their employers’ performance.

title: Biden nominates a telecom veteran to FCC in bid to overcome stalemate
description: Anna Gomez is Biden's latest pick in the hope of gaining a Democratic majority on the FCC.

title: The historic chess showdown between man and AI, decades before ChatGPT
description: More than a quarter-century before ChatGPT fueled an AI boom, the chess showdown between Kasparov and an IBM supercomputer captured the world’s attention.

title: Want to try journaling? Start by opening your phone or hiding it.
description: Get into digital journaling with these tips, apps and a little bit of AI.

title: E.U. slaps Meta with record $1.3 billion fine for data privacy violations
description: An E.U. body ruled that Meta's transfers of European Facebook users' data violated the bloc's privacy rules. Meta says it will appeal the decision.
